title: Timers
description: Timers are a method of allowing you to post messages in chat at certain intervals. Effective uses include advertising social/merch links, sub reminders etc. Timers will use commands regardless of their marked state (enabled/disabled) in the rotation.
deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete timer

interval.helper: How often the timer is posted in chat.

minimumLines.helper: The minimum number of lines that must have passed before the next timer is sent.

commands.helper: The commands that will be put into rotation for this timer.
